name: The Dead Town of Walking Zombies - Advanced Assault Warfare Strike
name_original: The Dead Town of Walking Zombies - Advanced Assault Warfare Strike
description:
Butterflyware is a small independent video game development studio based in the Czech Republic. We are mainly focused on mobile gaming. Our goal is to create single player story driven games. Butterflyware develops and publishes game products of its own.
www.butterflyware.com
